content: until the neck is long enought to cover the neck of your cozy when folded in my case this was at 15 cm 6 bind of using the sewn bind off see notes or pick any other very stretchy bind off method just make sure the opening will be stretchy enough to let the empty folded bottle in and out finishing soak the cozy in warm water with some wool wash or mild soap let it sit for an hour or so get out repeat chart a 8 times from left to right excess water by rolling it in a towel then put it repeat chart b 7 times for a total of 80 84 sts around the cozy and let it dry in shape when dry fill with hot water now enjoy the © 2014 hinke www ravelry com/designers/hinke warmth and softness keep away from cats they hinke s@gmail com may not give it back to you o pattern is intended for personal use only other uses are strictly prohibited all rights reserved 3
